blurb: Job is about the wise way to respond to suffering, but it’s not just about your own suffering. It’s about how to respond wisely to the suffering of others. The largest portion of Job is a back-and-forth conversation between Job and three of his close friends, friends who came to comfort him but made a horrible job of it. We can learn how to comfort one another with wisdom by recognizing what Job’s friends got wrong.
speaker: Matt McCullough
title: Job’s Friends
